steps.title: Where are the competition scores
steps.data: The competition scores are found to the right of the date on competition cards- howth data is always on the left!

steps.title: How do I refresh
steps.data: Refreshing is done automatically- all data is always up to date as long as you have an internet connection.

steps.title: Where are the competition details
steps.data: Tap a competition card to enter that competition page. The competition details are found at the top center (of this page) in the following order: location, date & lastly the time.

steps.title: How do I search for a competition
steps.data: In the Competitions page, tap the magnifying glass icon in the top right & enter search text.

steps.title: Where can I find additional details for a match/player
steps.data: In a competition page, you can tap on a player's name to see extra information. If you have access to the competition, you can update scores/hole data here.

steps.title: Go to the competitions page
steps.data: Tap the home icon in the top right corner of this page to return to the Competitions page.

steps.title: Locate your competition
steps.data: Scroll through the current & archived competitions to find your competition.

steps.title: Tap on the competition
steps.data: Tap anywhere on it's card to enter page with the details of your competition.

steps.title: Show the text box
steps.data: Tap the admin icon in the top right corner of the page. A text box should appear.

steps.title: Enter your code
steps.data: Tap on the text box that has appeared & type in your competition code.

steps.title: Submit entered code
steps.data: Tap the check icon in the top right corner of the page. The text box vanishes.

steps.title: Go to the app help page
steps.data: Tap the arrow icon in the top left corner of this page to go back to the App Help page.

steps.title: Show the text box
steps.data: Tap the admin icon in the top right corner of the page. A text box should appear.

steps.title: Enter your admin code
steps.data: Tap on the text box that has appeared & type in your admin code.

steps.title: Submit entered code
steps.data: Tap the check icon in the top right corner of the page. The text box vanishes.

steps.title: Add a hole
steps.data: In a competition page, tap the button at the bottom. Fill out the required information and tap the check icon in the top right.

steps.title: Remove a hole
steps.data: Tap on the hole you want to remove. In the drop-down that appears, tap the delete icon (below the edit icon) in the bottom left.

steps.title: Modify a hole
steps.data: Tap on the hole you want to modify. In the drop-down that appears, tap the edit icon (above the delete icon) in the top left.

steps.title: Updating hole numbers / scores
steps.data: Tap on the hole you want to modify. In the drop-down that appears, there will be 3 sets of plus/minus icons. They are vertically aligned with the number that they modify.

steps.title: Add a competition
steps.data: In the competitions page, tap the button at the bottom. Fill out the required information and tap the check icon in the top right.

steps.title: Remove a competition
steps.data: In the competitions page, each card will have a remove icon on the bottom right of it. Tap this icon to remove the associated competition.

steps.title: Modify a competition
steps.data: In the competitions page, each card will have a edit icon on the top right of it. Tap this icon to modify the associated competition.

steps.title: Add a manager
steps.data: In a competition page, the last competition detail is a 6-digit code. Give this to the future-manager to type into their app to gain access to the associated competition while the competition is current.
